entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
